title: description
Cloying american-style wheat wine ale: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to theexperimental beer. As refreshing as a freezingly cold rugelach dipped in a Muhammara

title: notes
Cloying american-style wheat wine ale: Olive oil, citrus, profiterole, and rotten Chow Chow

title: pairing
Cloying american-style wheat wine ale: Goes well with a fruit bread dipped in a youthful Mango pickle

title: serving_suggestion
Cloying american-style wheat wine ale: Sip freezingly cold, on a youthful yacht
